title: Somewhere between Maurea and Myriad...
content:
So a friend works for this company and wants to make some spoof t-shirts for an outting some of them are planning. I want to make the logo as accurate as possible, but I can’t seem to figure out the font. The closest I get is Myriad Pro Semibold and Maurea-Medium Caps Lf—but neither of them are it.

Any ideas?

(image removed)

 [‹ New soccer font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135121/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21287 "Go to previous forum topic") [Any clue what font this is? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415135121/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21282 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retrospect

comments.content:
Awesome!

I don’t know how I didn’t figure that out...that’s one favorite fonts! Must not have used it in a while.

Thanks!
Sometimes it’s the oldies that get overlooked :)
